tool.name: nmrML2BATMAN Converter

param.name: nmrMLzip
param.label: Zipped nmrML file.
param.help: A zipped nmrML file containing one or more NMR spectra, converted from nmrmlconv tool.

data.name: NMRdata
data.label: Tabulated TXT file containing NMR ppm and spectra.

tool.help:
Convert nmrML files (in a single zipped file) to a txt file for input of BATMAN.
.. class::infomark
**Author** Jianliang Gao (ICL). The nmrML converter was written by Daneil Jacob. Visit <http://www.nmrML.org> for more information.
